rosters.title: Operation Sports Official Launch Roster
rosters.author: Operation Sports Community
rosters.description: The flagship OS community roster with corrected ratings, updated depth charts, and real-world accuracy. One of the most downloaded rosters each year.

rosters.title: All-Madden Simulation Rosters
rosters.author: All-Madden.com
rosters.description: Focused on simulation gameplay with adjusted XP sliders and stat corrections. Best paired with All-Madden difficulty.

rosters.title: Operation Sports Final Season Roster
rosters.author: Operation Sports Community
rosters.description: Fully updated through the NFL regular season with accurate rosters, trades, and injury adjustments.

rosters.title: Franchise Mode Starter Pack
rosters.author: MaddenFranchiseMode.com Community
rosters.description: Built specifically for franchise mode with adjusted development traits, realistic contract values, and corrected player ages.

rosters.title: Operation Sports Best Roster (M24)
rosters.author: Operation Sports Community
rosters.description: The most widely used M24 roster with hundreds of community corrections and monthly updates throughout the season.

rosters.title: Sim Nation Community Rosters
rosters.author: Sim Nation Discord
rosters.description: Ratings and attributes tuned for simulation gameplay. Includes historical accuracy corrections and balanced gameplay adjustments.

rosters.title: Operation Sports CFB 25 Community Roster
rosters.author: Operation Sports Community
rosters.description: Community-corrected roster for EA Sports College Football 25 with updated ratings, accurate depth charts, and real transfer portal moves reflected.

rosters.title: r/NCAAFBseries Community Roster Pack
rosters.author: r/NCAAFBseries Community
rosters.description: Crowd-sourced roster updates from the active r/NCAAFBseries subreddit. Covers all FBS programs with corrected player ratings and positions.
